required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on July 28, 2020
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Feasibility Trial on ACURATE™ Transapical Implantation in Patients With Severe Symptomatic Aortic Stenosis (2009-01)
clinical_study.official_title: Feasibility Trial on ACURATE™ Transapical Implantation in Patients With Severe Symptomatic Aortic Stenosis

brief_summary.textblock: Feasibility Trial on the ACURATE TA™ transapical implantation in patients presenting severe symptomatic aortic stenosis to collect human feasibility data pertaining to the safety and performance of the device.

detailed_description.textblock: A single arm, prospective, multicenter, open trial up to 5 year follow-up with the SYMETIS ACURATE TA™ which is an aortic bioprosthesis for minimal invasive implantation via transapical access to treat patients with severe symptomatic aortic stenosis where conventional aortic valve replacement (AVR) via open heart surgery is considered to be associated with high surgical risk for evaluating the feasibility and performance of the implantation and the safety at 30-Day follow-up.

primary_outcome.description: Rate of Major Adverse Valve-Related Events (MAVRE) related to ACURATE

secondary_outcome.description: Stable ACURATE placement at intended site as assessed by angiography
Adequate ACURATE device function as assessed by echocardiography

secondary_outcome.time_frame: 30 days, 60 days, 3 months, 6 months and 12 months
discharge or 7 days, 3 months, 6 months and 12 months

secondary_outcome.measure: MACCE or Major Adverse Cardiac and Cerebrovascular Event
secondary_outcome.description: Rate of MACCE at follow up

arm_group.description: Patients implanted with ACURATE TA™ Bioprosthesis

intervention.description: ACURATE TA™ Transapical Aortic Bioprosthesis is intended for subjects with severe symptomatic Aortic Stenosis and are considered high risk for surgical conventional Aortic Valve Replacement surgery.
intervention.other_name: ACURATE TA™ Transapical Aortic Bioprosthesis and Delivery System

facility.name: Universitätsklinikum Hamburg-Eppendorf Klinik für Herz-und Gefäßchirurgie
